description: For the office. For the home office. For the city. For every season. The versatile Core Crew Neck Midlayer expresses your passion for the outdoors in all everyday situations. The soft French terry material makes it feel very comfortable to wear. It quickly wicks moisture from the skin and keeps you pleasantly warm at all times. Elasticated ribbed cuffs on the hem and sleeves ensure a good fit. Available with different prints. Can be combined with other items from the Mammut Logowear collection.
name: Mammut Mammut Core ML Crew Neck Objective - Mens
